metadata.title: USN-5028-1 -- Exiv2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Exiv2 incorrectly handled certain images. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5028-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  exiv2 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.7+esm3 libexiv2-14 - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.7+esm3 libexiv2-doc - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.7+esm3 libexiv2-dev - 0.25-2.1ubuntu16.04.7+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
